ruleBookInfo.kind:
class.uk-card.1@tag.font.4@text&&class.uk-label@text##(.)攻(.)受##$1$2
<js>
str = String(result);
result = str.replace(/原創/g, '原创')
.replace(/\//g, ',')
.replace(/\[/g, '')
.replace(/\]/g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/.未設置./g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/現/g, '现')
.replace(/劇/g, '剧')
.replace(/結/g, '结')
.replace(/連載中/g, '连载')
.replace(/纖細/g, '纤细')
.replace(/輕/g, '轻')
.replace(/鬆/g, '松')
.replace(/馬/g, '马')
.replace(/園/g, '园')
.replace(/溫/g, '温')
.replace(/懸/g, '悬')
.replace(/職場/g, '职场')
.replace(/靈異/g, '灵异')
.replace(/種/g, '种')
.replace(/網遊/g, '网游')
.replace(/勵/g, '励')
.replace(/宮/g, '宫')
.replace(/會/g, '会')
.replace(/運動/g, '运动')
.replace(/話/g, '话')
.replace(/俠/g, '侠')
.replace(/羅/g, '罗')
.replace(/視/g, '视')
.replace(/帥/g, '帅');
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
result.replace(/[\S\s]+Scripts.*\s*/, '')
.replace(/([\s\S]*?)※※※※※※※※※※※※※([\s\S]*?)※※※※※※※※※※※※※/g, '$2$1')
.replace(/[\S\s]*?※※※※※※※※※※※※※/, '收费章节，请付费后阅读。\n')
.replace(/作家想說的話/, '作者有话说')
.replace(/彩蛋內容：/, '【彩蛋内容：】')
.replace(/\s*留言送出完成。/, '')
.replace(/下方留下評論後可完成敲蛋!/, '')
.replace(/\s*信息加載中.../, '');
</js>

ruleExplore.intro: text##.*(連載中|完結)\s|.*(連載中|完結)

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
laiyuan='来源【0】';
result='换源列表（编辑简介修改来源的序号，保存刷新，可更改对应的源）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>

ruleContent.content:
content={ childNode:[], childNodes: result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)?java.getElements("#"+result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)[1]+"@p").toArray():"", UpWz:function(m, i) { var k = Math.ceil((i + 1) % this.code); k = Math.ceil(m - k); return k }, load:function(){ this.code=String(result).match(/codeurl="(\d+)"/)[1]; var e =String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name=client]@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) { var k = this.UpWz(e[i], i); this.childNode[k]=this.childNodes[i] }} } if(baseUrl.match(/getVerify/)){ href="https://www.beiyongzhan.me/mytool/getVerify/?d="+Math.random(); aid=java.get('aid') url="https://www.beiyongzhan.me/mytool/getChapterList/"; verify=book.getVariable("custom"); body="verify="+verify+"&aid="+aid+"&sbt=提交" c=String(java.post(url,body,{}).cookies()).replace(/\{|\}/g,''); headers={"headers":{"Cookie":c}} source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(headers)) result='
'+"长按上面的图片查看验证码，或者右上角三点将图片样式改成FULL刷新正文查看验证码（没有图片的话请关闭替换净化）
详情页右上角三点，编辑书籍变量，填上验证码确定
详情页右上角三点刷新
如果刷新以后还是要获取的验证码，说明验证码不对，刷新正文获取新的验证码，重复上面步骤" }else{if(baseUrl.match(/\d+_2\.html/)){ content.load(); result=content.childNode.join("
");}else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result=java.getElements("#contentinfo@p") }else{ result=result.match(/html\(d\("([\s\S]+?)",".*?\)\)/)[1]; }} result+"❎"
